about_the_game:
Disney Infinity 3.0: Gold Edition includes Star Wars™ to the ever-growing collection of Marvel, Disney and Disney•Pixar characters, stories and worlds NOW with all Disney Infinity Characters and Playsets Unlocked. Together new heroes can join forces with all other Disney Infinity characters and embark on adventures as big as your imagination in the 3.0 Toy Box! Disney Infinity encourages you to play your way, whether you explore open-world creation in the Toy Box or story-driven gameplay inside Play Sets!

All Disney Infinity 3.0 Playsets Unlocked:
- Twilight of the Republic
- Rise Against the Empire
- The Force Awakens
- And More...

All Disney Infinity 3.0 Characters Unlocked:
- Rey
- Yoda
- Chewbacca
- Han Solo
- Darth Vader
- Hulkbuster
- Ultron
- Iron Man
- Olaf
- All Disney Infinity 1.0 Characters
- All Disney Infinity 2.0 Characters
- And More...

Enjoy Disney Infinity with a Full Toy Box!
detailed_description:
Disney Infinity 3.0: Gold Edition includes Star Wars™ to the ever-growing collection of Marvel, Disney and Disney•Pixar characters, stories and worlds NOW with all Disney Infinity Characters and Playsets Unlocked. Together new heroes can join forces with all other Disney Infinity characters and embark on adventures as big as your imagination in the 3.0 Toy Box! Disney Infinity encourages you to play your way, whether you explore open-world creation in the Toy Box or story-driven gameplay inside Play Sets!

- The Force Awakens

name: Disney Infinity 3.0: Gold Edition

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows Vista / 7 / 8
  • Processor: 2.2 GHz Dual-Core CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce 560 / ATI Radeon HD 5600 1 GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.40 Ghz Intel Core i7-4700MQ
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce 960 GTX 2 GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 15 GB available space

pegi.descriptors:
Game contains depictions of violence
Game may be frightening or scary for young children

short_description: Enjoy Disney Infinity with a Full Toy Box! Disney Infinity 3.0: Gold Edition includes Star Wars with the existing collection of Marvel and Disney characters and worlds, and NOW with all Characters and Playsets Unlocked. Embark on adventures as big as your imagination in the 3.0 Toy Box!
supported_languages:
English*, French*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Dutch*, Polish*
*languages with full audio support
